tool_description: API for xvideos porn videos, our database has more than 6 million records extracted from the site's official database.
name: xvideos
title: xvideos

api_list.name: Single Video
api_list.description: returns a single video if it exists
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://xvideos2.p.rapidapi.com/video/79671341"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "xvideos2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://xvideos2.p.rapidapi.com/video/{video_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "xvideos2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

api_list.name: Videos by Category
api_list.description: Return the videos available in that category

required_parameters.name: category_name
required_parameters.description: The name of the category to display, the available categories can be returned with the categories endpoint

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page to be displayed by default will be 1 if not specified.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: It is the limit of results to display, minimum 1 and maximum 100. By default it will return 10;

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Allows you to search for videos

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: The term you want to search

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: It is the limit of results to display, minimum 1 and maximum 100. By default it will return 10;

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page to be displayed by default will be 1 if not specified.

optional_parameters.name: gender
optional_parameters.description:
By default it returns all genres, if a genre is specified the rest of the genres will be excluded from the query.
Available genres: straight, gay, lesbian, shemale
